Name: Stream Counter
About the game: Work in Progress Stream Counter allows keeping track of in-game deaths or other counted related things. There will be more updates coming to the program and features are planned for release. If you have any ideas for the program, please feel free to share! Easy to Use This application has been made easy to use. The counter can be increased or decreased within an application when not in focus. (CLICK ANYWHERE IN THE APPLICATION TO BRING UP SETTINGS)
